name: secant remix
description:
secant remix is a psychedelic journey through unfamiliar planes.

there might be a hidden puzzle, you can care about it or not.

use gamepad or WASD and spacebar to move

this game is a remix of Corey Bertelsen's secant: http://www.8ude.com/

by Hang https://itch.io/profile/ruanhang

and turist
